text: Colorado elects 8 members of the United States House of Representatives and 2 members of the United States Senate. == House delegation (118th Congress) == District 1: Diana DeGette (Democratic) District 2: Joe Neguse (Democratic) District 3: Lauren Boebert (Republican) District 4: Greg Lopez (Republican) District 5: Doug Lamborn (Republican) District 6: Jason Crow (Democratic) District 7: Brittany Pettersen (Democratic) District 8: Yadira Caraveo (Democratic) == Senate delegation (118th Congress) == * John Hickenlooper (Democratic) * Michael Bennet (Democratic) Category:Colorado elections
title: United States congressional delegations from Colorado
